Tech @ H&M Group

We are a community of creators, doers, learners, entrepreneurs, and innovators. Our mission is to re- invent the world of fashion through technology, creating meaningful growth along the way. With the right people and cutting-edge tech, we can help drive change towards a more sustainable future.
